name: Farting Simulator
description:
Welcome to Farting Simulator,

Press F to Fart (& pay respects)



In Farting Simulator, you control a character who can emit various fart smells which you can smell with the help of placebo.

But Farting Simulator isn't just about mindlessly wandering around and farting. This game is also a platformer, requiring skillful timing and precision to navigate the castle and past the FART HATERS trying to shoot you.

So why not dive into the world of Farting Simulator and experience the ultimate in meme-filled, funny, and comedic entertainment? It's a game that's sure to leave you FARTING HARD!
